url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Golem Manual/Stone Golem Guardian Manual

sections.body: The book contains antimagic field, discern location, geas/quest, limited wish, shield other, and symbol of stunning. The reader may treat her caster level as three levels higher than normal for the purpose of crafting a stone golem guardian. Strong abjuration and enchantment; CL 14th; Craft Construct, antimagic field, discern location, geas/quest, limited wish, shield other, symbol of stunning, creator must be caster level 14th.

name: Stone Golem Guardian Manual
